Uses of Package
net.sf.freecol.server.control

  • Packages that use net.sf.freecol.server.control 
    Package Description
    net.sf.freecol.common.networking
    Contains the common networking classes.
    net.sf.freecol.server
    The main package of the server package tree.
    net.sf.freecol.server.control
    Contains the classes responsible for the control of the game.
    net.sf.freecol.server.model
    Contains model classes with server specific information.
  • Classes in net.sf.freecol.server.control used by net.sf.freecol.common.networking 
    Class and Description
    FreeColServerHolder
    This base class provides thread-safe access to a FreeColServer for several subclasses.
  • Classes in net.sf.freecol.server.control used by net.sf.freecol.server 
    Class and Description
    Controller
    The control object that is responsible for making changes to the internal model and for communicating with the clients.
    InGameController
    The main server controller.
    InGameInputHandler
    Handles the network messages that arrives while in game.
    PreGameInputHandler
    Handles the network messages that arrives before the game starts.
    UserConnectionHandler
    Handles a new client connection.
  • Classes in net.sf.freecol.server.control used by net.sf.freecol.server.control 
    Class and Description
    ChangeSet
    Changes to be sent to the client.
    ChangeSet.ChangePriority 
    ChangeSet.See
    Class to control the visibility of a change.
    Controller
    The control object that is responsible for making changes to the internal model and for communicating with the clients.
    FreeColServerHolder
    This base class provides thread-safe access to a FreeColServer for several subclasses.
    ServerInputHandler
    Handles the network messages on the server side.
  • Classes in net.sf.freecol.server.control used by net.sf.freecol.server.model 
    Class and Description
    ChangeSet
    Changes to be sent to the client.
